last_episode_to_air.name: The Future
last_episode_to_air.overview: Steven is finally ready to move on.

name: Steven Universe Future
overview: After saving the universe, Steven is still at it, tying up every loose end. As he runs out of other people's problems to solve, he'll finally have to face his own.

episodes.name: Little Homeschool
episodes.overview: One Gem refuses to attend Little Homeschool, a place on Earth where Gems from all over the universe can come learn how to live together peacefully.

episodes.name: Guidance
episodes.overview: Amethyst has been helping Little Homeschool Gems find jobs on the boardwalk, but Steven isn't sure about her approach.

episodes.name: Rose Buds
episodes.overview: Steven gets a surprise visit from some old friends, and an even more surprising introduction to some new ones.

guest_stars.character: Superfan Rose / Shy Rose / Hippie Rose (voice)
guest_stars.name: Kimberly Brooks

episodes.name: Volleyball
episodes.overview: Steven is determined to help Pink Diamond's original Pearl heal the scar on her face.

episodes.name: Bluebird
episodes.overview: Steven questions the motives of a mysterious fusion that suddenly shows up at his house.

episodes.name: A Very Special Episode
episodes.overview: Rainbow Quartz 2.0 promised to hang out with Onion the same day Sunstone scheduled a home safety Geminar! How can Steven be in two places, and two fusions, at once?

episodes.name: Snow Day
episodes.overview: Steven and the Crystal Gems get a chance to catch up when they’re all snowed in together.

episodes.name: Why So Blue?
episodes.overview: Steven has heard rumors of a pair of Gems that are still destroying worlds. If he can’t stop them, maybe Lapis can.

episodes.name: Little Graduation
episodes.overview: Steven and the Gems celebrate Little Homeschool's first graduating class.

episodes.name: Prickly Pair
episodes.overview: After leaving Little Homeschool, Steven has found a new hobby, plants.

episodes.name: In Dreams
episodes.overview: Steven and Peridot watch a reboot of their favorite show, Camp Pining Hearts.

episodes.name: Bismuth Casual
episodes.overview: Pearl invites Bismuth to the roller rink for a lesson on how to forge human relationships.

episodes.name: Together Forever
episodes.overview: Connie has a really clear vision for her future. Steven wants to make sure he'll be a part of it.

episodes.name: Growing Pains
episodes.overview: Steven visits a doctor for the first time.

episodes.name: Mr. Universe
episodes.overview: Greg takes Steven on the road to find the origins of the Universe name.

episodes.name: Fragments
episodes.overview: Steven heads to the woods to train with a powerful mentor.

episodes.name: Homeworld Bound
episodes.overview: Steven heads to the Diamonds for advice on how to control his new powers.

episodes.name: Everything's Fine
episodes.overview: Steven insists that everything is fine.

episodes.name: I Am My Monster
episodes.overview: Everything is not fine.

episodes.name: The Future
episodes.overview: Steven is finally ready to move on.
